definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">item_crafted</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:LinkDagger</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="strike_lightning"><field name="effectOnly">TRUE</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="get_localized_text"><value name="key"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">message.link_dagger_craft</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="spawn_particle_multi"><field name="particle">CUSTOM:LinkDaggerParticle</field><value name="count"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1000</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="dx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="dy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="dz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.1</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
